required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study of Hetrombopag in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Bioequivalence Study of Different Formulations of Hetrombopag Olamine Tablets in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This study consists of two parts. Part 1 is a pilot BE study, and Part 2 is a pivotal study to demonstrate the bioequivalence of test and reference formulation, both of which adopt a single-center, randomized, open-label, three-period crossover design.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the plasma concentration vs time curve (AUC0-120)
area under the plasma concentration vs time curve (AUC0-inf)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Drug Concentration in Plasma After Single Dose (Tmax)
Half-life Associated With the Terminal Slope (tÂ½)
The number of volunteers with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability

arm_group.arm_group_label: Treatment group A: T - R- R

intervention.description: Hetrombopag Olamine Tablet (T: test formulation) Hetrombopag Olamine Tablet (R: reference formulation)
